mapper.select: SELECT uc.collect_id, uc.user_id, uc.cid, uc.collect_time, c.name, c.description, c.item_count, c.sort_order FROM user_collection uc LEFT JOIN category c ON uc.cid = c.cid WHERE uc.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uc.collect_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_collection (user_id, cid, collect_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{cid}, #{collectTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_collection WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND cid = #{cid}
